select RECORD_ID, EMPLOYEE_ID, VERIFY_TIME, TOTAL_POINT, BUSY_GRADE, DAY_COMPLETE_SCORE, DAY_QUALITY_SCORE, VERIFY_ID, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIED_TIME,UNRESOLVER_BUG_COUNT from tbl_labour_verify
order by ${orderByClause}

select RECORD_ID, EMPLOYEE_ID, VERIFY_TIME, TOTAL_POINT, BUSY_GRADE, DAY_COMPLETE_SCORE, DAY_QUALITY_SCORE, VERIFY_ID, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIED_TIME,UNRESOLVER_BUG_COUNT from tbl_labour_verify where RECORD_ID = #{recordId:VARCHAR}
select * from tbl_labour_verify where EMPLOYEE_ID =#{employeeId:VARCHAR} and VERIFY_TIME =#{verifyTime:DATE}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_labour_verify (RECORD_ID, EMPLOYEE_ID, VERIFY_TIME, TOTAL_POINT, BUSY_GRADE, DAY_COMPLETE_SCORE, DAY_QUALITY_SCORE, VERIFY_ID, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIED_TIME,UNRESOLVER_BUG_COUNT) values (#{recordId:VARCHAR}, #{employeeId:VARCHAR}, #{verifyTime:DATE}, #{totalPoint:DECIMAL}, #{busyGrade:DECIMAL}, #{dayCompleteScore:DECIMAL}, #{dayQualityScore:DECIMAL}, #{verifyId:VARCHAR}, #{remark:VARCHAR}, #{createTime:TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedTime:TIMESTAMP},#{unresolverBugCount:INTEGER})

insert into tbl_labour_verify
RECORD_ID , EMPLOYEE_ID , VERIFY_TIME , TOTAL_POINT , BUSY_GRADE , DAY_COMPLETE_SCORE , DAY_QUALITY_SCORE , VERIFY_ID , REMARK , CREATE_TIME , MODIFIED_TIME , UNRESOLVER_BUG_COUNT , ) values
#{recordId:VARCHAR} , #{employeeId:VARCHAR} , #{verifyTime:DATE} , #{totalPoint:DECIMAL} , #{busyGrade:DECIMAL} , #{dayCompleteScore:DECIMAL} , #{dayQualityScore:DECIMAL} , #{verifyId:VARCHAR} , #{remark:VARCHAR} , #{createTime:TIMESTAMP} , #{modifiedTime:TIMESTAMP} , #{UNRESOLVER_BUG_COUNT:INTEGER} , )
mapper.update:
update tbl_labour_verify
RECORD_ID = #{record.recordId:VARCHAR} , EMPLOYEE_ID = #{record.employeeId:VARCHAR} , VERIFY_TIME = #{record.verifyTime:DATE} , TOTAL_POINT = #{record.totalPoint:DECIMAL} , BUSY_GRADE = #{record.busyGrade:DECIMAL} , DAY_COMPLETE_SCORE = #{record.dayCompleteScore:DECIMAL} , DAY_QUALITY_SCORE = #{record.dayQualityScore:DECIMAL} , VERIFY_ID = #{record.verifyId:VARCHAR} , REMARK = #{record.remark:VARCHAR} , CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime:TIMESTAMP} , MODIFIED_TIME = #{record.modifiedTime:TIMESTAMP} , UNRESOLVER_BUG_COUNT = #{record.unresolverBugCount:INTEGER} ,

update tbl_labour_verify set RECORD_ID = #{record.recordId:VARCHAR}, EMPLOYEE_ID = #{record.employeeId:VARCHAR}, VERIFY_TIME = #{record.verifyTime:DATE}, TOTAL_POINT = #{record.totalPoint:DECIMAL}, BUSY_GRADE = #{record.busyGrade:DECIMAL}, DAY_COMPLETE_SCORE = #{record.dayCompleteScore:DECIMAL}, DAY_QUALITY_SCORE = #{record.dayQualityScore:DECIMAL}, VERIFY_ID = #{record.verifyId:VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{record.remark:VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime:TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIED_TIME = #{record.modifiedTime:TIMESTAMP}, UNRESOLVER_BUG_COUNT = #{record.unresolverBugCount:INTEGER}

update tbl_labour_verify
EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId:VARCHAR} , VERIFY_TIME = #{verifyTime:DATE} , TOTAL_POINT = #{totalPoint:DECIMAL} , BUSY_GRADE = #{busyGrade:DECIMAL} , DAY_COMPLETE_SCORE = #{dayCompleteScore:DECIMAL} , DAY_QUALITY_SCORE = #{dayQualityScore:DECIMAL} , VERIFY_ID = #{verifyId:VARCHAR} , REMARK = #{remark:VARCHAR} , CREATE_TIME = #{createTime:TIMESTAMP} , MODIFIED_TIME = #{modifiedTime:TIMESTAMP} , UNRESOLVER_BUG_COUNT = #{unresolverBugCount:INTEGER} , where RECORD_ID = #{recordId:VARCHAR}

update tbl_labour_verify set EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId:VARCHAR}, VERIFY_TIME = #{verifyTime:DATE}, TOTAL_POINT = #{totalPoint:DECIMAL}, BUSY_GRADE = #{busyGrade:DECIMAL}, DAY_COMPLETE_SCORE = #{dayCompleteScore:DECIMAL}, DAY_QUALITY_SCORE = #{dayQualityScore:DECIMAL}, VERIFY_ID = #{verifyId:VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark:VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime:TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIED_TIME = #{modifiedTime:TIMESTAMP}, UNRESOLVER_BUG_COUNT = #{unresolverBugCount:INTEGER} where RECORD_ID = #{recordId:VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_labour_verify WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID=#{employeeId:VARCHAR} AND date_format(VERIFY_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')
